item.description:
Join us at our kickoff "Green Bag Lunch" event - a new series of get-togethers on Friday afternoons in downtown Boston. Each month will feature a different environmental topic and offer a way to get involved and make a difference.

With the upcoming state legislative elections just a few months away, we'll be discussing the State Legislative Process, how bills are written, reviewed, debated, and enacted - and how YOU can help get good bills passed (and bad bills defeated). Bring your own lunch and beverage. We'll spend the first 15 minutes socializing, about 20 minutes hearing about the process, and the rest of the time working on specific bills that are "stuck" in the process.

Sponsored by the Sierra Club's Greater Boston Group. RSVPs welcome but not required. This is a free event and open to all. For more information: Mary Ann Nelson 617-442-0123 or NelsonMASierra@aol.com

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bag Lunch - An Easy Way to Get Green!
